alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Itasca, southeastern Koochiching and west central St. Louis Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Nett Lake, or 33 miles west of Lake Vermilion, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meadow Brook around 335 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North St. Louis
